pageTitle: Phaelix AI - Strategic AI for Ambitious Businesses
metaDescription: Phaelix AI builds custom AI solutions for SMEs—automation, insights, and growth.
heroDescription: Phaelix AI bridges the gap between your business and its potential. We deliver custom AI solutions that automate processes, uncover critical insights, and drive sustainable growth for Small and Medium-sized Enterprises.
workGandalfDesc: Private personal assistant built with OpenClaw — long‑term memory helper with guardrails and safety backups.
